tests.test_home: test_home - Click Home Navigation, Add Application button, then Cancel
tests.test_application: test_application - Click Applications Navigation, Add button, then Cancel
tests.test_companies: test_companies - Click Companies Navigation, Add button, populate all fields, then Cancel
tests.test_contacts: test_contacts - Click Contacts Navigation, Add button, populate all fields, then Cancel
tests.test_clients: test_clients - Click Clients Navigation, Add button, populate all fields, then Cancel
tests.test_notes: test_notes - Click Notes Navigation, verify there are no notes
tests.test_job_search_sites_api: test_job_search_sites_api - Click Job Search Sites Navigation, verify all Names and URLs against API
tests.test_job_search_sites_db: test_job_search_sites_db - Click Job Search Sites Navigation, verify all Names and URLs against database
